text: ql -ayha alrswl-: 'iiniy 'aebud allah wahdah la sharik lah mkhlsana lah eibadati wtaety, faebuduu antm- 'ayuha almshrkwn- ma shitum min dun allah min al'awthan walasnam waghayr dhlk min mkhlwqath, fala ydrny dhlk shyyana. whdha tahdid wweyd liman eabd ghyr allh, wa'ashrak maeah ghyrh. qul -ayha alrswl-: 'iina alkhasryn- hqana- hum aladhin khasiruu 'anfusahum wa'ahlihim yawm alqyamt, wdhlk b'ighwayhm fi aldunya w'idlalhm ean al'iyman. 'ala 'iina khsran hwla' almushrikin 'anfusahum wa'ahlihim yawm alqiamat hu alkhusran albyin alwadh
